Wishful Thinking is an upcoming American romantic comedy film written by and directed by Graham Parkes, and starring Maya Hawke and Lewis Pullman.
Cast
* Maya Hawke
* Lewis Pullman
* Randall Park
* Jake Shane
* Amita Rao
* Eric Rahill
* Kate Berlant
* Kerri Kenney-Silver
Production
The film is written and directed by Graham Parkes. It is produced by Highway 10, Buckwild and Pinky Promise with Matt Smith and Dan Gedman producing for Highway 10, Lewis Pullman producing for his company Buckwild, and Kara Durrett for Pinky Promise.
Lewis Pullman leads the cast alongside Maya Hawke, with Randall Park, Jake Shane, Amita Rao, Eric Rahill, Kate Berlant and Kerri Kenney-Silver. Principal photography took place in August 2025. Filming locations included Portland, Oregon.
